name.en: Spatial Data Interpretation and Digital Mapping
name.ch: 空間資料銓釋與數值製圖

department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家社會及政策碩士班
department.en: Master Program of Hakka Social and Policy Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程經由課堂講授以及實習操作學習空間資料銓釋與數值製圖相關方法。本課程將使用GIS軟體進行教學，引導學生學習如何使用GIS軟體來進行空間資料的處理、編繪、詮釋及製圖。
goal.en: This class uses lectures and exercises to help students to learn knowledge of spatial data and skills for digital mapping. Overall, the goal of this class is to help students to learn how to collect, edit, interpret and display spatial data using established GIS tools.

outline.ch: 本課程包含空間資料的基礎、座標系統與地圖投影、地圖繪製理論與技巧與介紹各類數值地圖及其相關應用。本課程包含演講與實作，修課學生必須完成交付之實習作業。課程將會有一次課堂測驗以及學期計畫。計畫必須於期末前進行口頭報告並繳交書面報告。
outline.en: This class covers topics about fundamentals of spatial data, coordinate systems and map projections, mapping theories and skills, and related study cases and applications. Students should complete assignments, including readings and lab exercises. We will have one in-class exam and students are expected to complete a group project, which will be presented by an oral presentation and a short written report

textbook.ch: 由教師提供之課程講義
textbook.en: Lecture materials will be provided by the instructor.

gradMethod.ch: 在第一堂課程中與學生共同討論
gradMethod.en: Will be discussed with all students in the first lecture

officeHour.ch: 利用電子郵件預約時間

ch.competencies: 獨立思考與反思批判能力

en.competencies: 獨立思考與反思批判能力
